name: 360training OSHA Outreach
description: OSHA-authorized online training at unbeatable prices for construction and general industry.
target_audience_match: Perfect for small business owners and individual workers who need legit OSHA certification without spending a fortune.

name: OSHA Education Center
description: Comprehensive and affordable OSHA-authorized training with fast certificate delivery.
target_audience_match: Great fit for budget-conscious HR teams trying to keep everyone certified without delay or overpaying.

name: ClickSafety
description: Trusted safety training with frequent discounts on OSHA 10 and 30-hour courses.
target_audience_match: Ideal for solo contractors and small crews who want simple, mobile-friendly OSHA training that fits the budget.

name: National Safety Council (NSC) Training
description: Non-profit OSHA-aligned materials at low cost, including free safety resources.
target_audience_match: Best for workplaces that want nonprofit credibility and are searching for free or low-cost OSHA-aligned tools.

name: Hard Hat Training
description: Pay-once downloadable OSHA-aligned kits for on-site or virtual group training.
target_audience_match: Perfect for safety officers or foremen looking to train multiple employees with no subscriptions or recurring costs.
